title: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos
text:
Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Rafael Nadal of Spain celebrates match point following the men's singles final against Dominic Thiem of Austria during day of 15 of the 2019 French Open at Roland Garros on June 9, 2019 in Paris. Hide Caption 1 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Kyle Lowry of the Toronto Raptors argues with Warriors minority investor Mark Stevens (blue shirt) after Lowry chased down a loose ball in the second half against the Golden State Warriors during Game Three of the 2019 NBA Finals at ORACLE Arena on June 5, 2019 in Oakland, California. Hide Caption 2 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Sir Winston (7), with jockey Joel Rosario up, crosses the finish line to win the 151st running of the Belmont Stakes horse race, Saturday, June 8, 2019, in Elmont, New York. Hide Caption 3 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos NHRA top fuel driver Antron Brown explodes an engine during the Route 66 Nationals at Route 66 Raceway in Joliet, Illinois, on June 2, 2019. Hide Caption 4 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos USA's Donovan Brazier, left, competes on his way to win the Men's 800m ahead of Botswana's Nijel Amos, center, during the IAAF Diamond League competition on June 6, 2019 at the Olympic stadium in Rome. Hide Caption 5 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Ashleigh Barty of Australia kisses the trophy as she celebrates victory following the ladies singles final against Marketa Vondrousova of The Czech Republic during day 14 of the 2019 French Open at Roland Garros on June 8, 2019 in Paris. Hide Caption 6 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Italy team members lift Barbara Bonansea in the air as they celebrate her winning goal after the final whistle during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup France group C match between Australia and Italy at Stade du Hainaut on June 9, 2019 in Valenciennes, France. Hide Caption 7 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Valentina Shevchenko of Kyrgyzstan, right, celebrates her KO victory over Jessica Eye, left, in their women's flyweight championship bout during the UFC 238 event at the United Center on June 8, 2019 in Chicago, Illinois. Hide Caption 8 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Vanderbilt Kumar Rocker (80) celebrates his no-hitter, beating Duke 3-0 in the NCAA Division I Baseball Super Regionals at Hawkins Field Saturday, June 8, 2019, in Nashville, Tennessee. Hide Caption 9 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Tuukka Rask #40 of the Boston Bruins allows a second period goal to Ryan O'Reilly (not pictured) #90 of the St. Louis Blues in Game Five of the 2019 NHL Stanley Cup Final at TD Garden on June 6, 2019 in Boston. Hide Caption 10 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Texas Rangers' Delino DeShields receives an ice water shower from Elvis Andrus after hitting a game-winning RBI single in the 12th inning of the team's baseball game against the Baltimore Orioles, Wednesday, June 5, 2019, in Arlington, Texas. Texas won 2-1. Hide Caption 11 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Jonas Jerebko of the Golden State Warriors attempts a shot against Serge Ibaka of the Toronto Raptors in the second half during Game Three of the 2019 NBA Finals at ORACLE Arena on June 5, 2019 in Oakland. Hide Caption 12 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Cristiano Ronaldo of Portugal celebrates the victory with the trophy after the match between Portugal v Holland at the Estadio do Dragao on June 9, 2019 in Porto, Portugal. Hide Caption 13 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos UCLA players celebrate after defeating Oklahoma in the NCAA softball Women's College World Series in Oklahoma City, Tuesday, June 4, 2019. UCLA won 5-4 in Game 2, taking both games in the best-of-three series. Hide Caption 14 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Lakey Peterson of the United States wins the 2019 Margaret River Pro after winning the final at Main Break on June 4, 2019 in Margaret River, Western Australia. Hide Caption 15 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Serbia's Novak Djokovic returns the ball to Austria's Dominic Thiem during their men's singles semi-final match on day 13 of the Roland Garros 2019 French Open tennis tournament in Paris on June 7, 2019. Hide Caption 16 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos South Korea's goalkeeper Min-Jeong Kim, left, vies with France's forward Valerie Gauvin during the France 2019 Women's World Cup Group A football match between France and South Korea, on June 7, 2019, at the Parc des Princes stadium, in Paris. Hide Caption 17 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Bubba Nickles of the UCLA Bruins celebrates after hitting a home run against the Oklahoma Sooners during the Division I Women's Softball Championship held at ASA Hall of Fame Stadium-OGE Energy Field on June 4, 2019 in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. Hide Caption 18 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Participant race during the ADAC GT-Masters in Spielberg, Austria on June 9, 2019. Hide Caption 19 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Dearica Hamby #5 of the Las Vegas Aces blocks a shot by Morgan Tuck #33 of the Connecticut Sun during their game at the Mandalay Bay Events Center on June 2, 2019 in Las Vegas, Nevada. Hide Caption 20 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Rory McIlroy of Northern Ireland plays his shot from the eighth tee during the final round of the RBC Canadian Open at Hamilton Golf and Country Club on June 9, 2019 in Hamilton, Canada. Hide Caption 21 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Willy Adames #1 of the Tampa Bay Rays is tagged out at first base by Michael Chavis #23 of the Boston Red Sox in the fourth inning during game one of a double header at Fenway Park on June 8, 2019 in Boston. Hide Caption 22 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Steam rises from a scrum during the round 17 Super Rugby match between the Waratahs and the Brumbies at Bankwest Stadium on June 8, 2019 in Sydney, Australia. Hide Caption 23 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Netherlands' Memphis Depay in action during UEFA Nations League Semi Final against England in Estadio D. Afonso Henriques, Guimaraes, Portugal on June 6, 2019. Hide Caption 24 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Jacques Janse van Rensburg of South Africa and Team Dimension Data / Zdenek Stybar of Czech Republic and Team Deceuninck-QuickStep / Puy Mary (1589m)/ Landscape / Mountains / Peloton / during the 71st Criterium du Dauphine 2019, Stage 1 a 142km stage from Aurillac to Jussac on June 9, 2019 in Jussac, France. Hide Caption 25 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Karolina Kowalkiewicz (red gloves) and Alexa Grasso (blue gloves) during UFC 238 at United Center. Hide Caption 26 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Boston Bruins defenseman Charlie McAvoy (73) is checked by St. Louis Blues left wing Jaden Schwartz (17) during the first period in game five of the 2019 Stanley Cup Final at TD Garden. Hide Caption 27 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Liz Cambage #8 of the Las Vegas Aces rebounds the ball against the Atlanta Dream on June 6, 2019, at State Farm Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. Hide Caption 28 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Kevin Krawietz, left, and Andreas Mies, right, of Germany react after winning the men's doubles final match during the French Open tennis tournament at Roland Garros in Paris on June 8, 2019. Hide Caption 29 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Greyhounds compete during an annual international dog race in Gelsenkirchen, Germany, June 9, 2019. Hide Caption 30 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Aaron Gwin performs at UCI DH World Cup in Leogang, Austria on June 9, 2019. Hide Caption 31 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Sunset is seen over Citi Field during the fourth inning between the New York Mets and the Colorado Rockies. Hide Caption 32 of 34

Photos: What a shot! 34 amazing sports photos Paul Vaughan of the Blues is tackled during game one of the 2019 State of Origin series between the Queensland Maroons and the New South Wales Blues at Suncorp Stadium on June 5, 2019 in Brisbane, Australia. Hide Caption 33 of 34
